last_episode_to_air.name: Back On Shaq
last_episode_to_air.overview: At a basketball match, Shaquille O'Neal discovers that Johnny Bravo brings him good luck. This occurs up to Shaq's showdown match with Seth Green whose brought along his own good luck charm by the name of Huckleberry Hound.

name: Johnny Bravo
overview: Johnny Bravo tells the story of a biceps-bulging, karate-chopping free spirit who believes he is a gift from God to the women of the earth. Unfortunately for Johnny, everyone else sees him as a narcissistic Mama's boy with big muscles and even bigger hair. In short, he is the quintessential guy who 'just doesn't get it.' No matter what he does, or where he finds himself, he always winds up being his own worst enemy.

episodes.name: Johnny Bravo
episodes.overview: Johnny has to track down a gorilla that escaped from the zoo.

episodes.name: Jungle Boy In Mr. Monkeyman
episodes.overview: Johnny is thrown off a plane and he hurts Jungleboy and King Raymond tries to capture Johnny.

episodes.name: Johnny Bravo and the Amazon Women
episodes.overview: Johnny falls off a ship and ends up on an island of beautiful Amazon women.

episodes.name: Super Duped
episodes.overview: Johnny meets Suzy, who is talking about her show and tell project at school, on his way to the store to purchase some items for his mother. When he discovers that Suzy's teacher is hot, and that she likes heroes, he decided to become Suzy's next Show and Tell by becoming Bravo Man. He tries to impress the teacher by chasing after a criminal who robbed the bank.

episodes.name: Bungled In The Jungle
episodes.overview: On an airplane, Johnny is thrown out of the airplane by a stewardess and lands in the jungle. He crushed a boy, whose name was Jungle Boy. Jungle Boy's leg was broken after the fall, and as revenge, the animals of the jungle attack Johnny. King Ray, an evil gorilla decided to have the animals continue chasing after Johnny, so that they will think that Jungle Boy is a threat because Jungle Boy and Johnny are both humans.

episodes.name: Bearly Enough Time!
episodes.overview: When Bunny left their camp to find the remaining ingredients to complete Johnny's pinecone suit. When Johnny believes that Bunny was lost in the words, h

episodes.name: The Sensitive Male!
episodes.overview: Johnny tries to get a date with a girl who is in love with a sensitive dancer.

episodes.name: Bravo Dooby-Doo
episodes.overview: Johnny meets the Scooby-Doo gang when his car breaks down before he gets to his aunt's house and when he gets to the house Johnny and the Scooby-Doo gang have to find his aunt.

episodes.name: Date With an Antelope
episodes.overview: Johnny meets an antelope named ""Carol"" for a date. He did not realize Carol was an antelope because he met her on the Internet. On their date, everything went horribly wrong, and at the end, Carol confesses that she was only dating Johnny to get her boyfriend (which is a crab) jealous.

episodes.name: Did You See A Bull Run By Here?
episodes.overview: This bull meets Johnny and the bull wants to fight. Johnny defeated the bull to impress a woman in the crowd. But when Johnny realizes the crowd was going to eat the bull as food, Johnny, the woman, and the bull sneak out and they are safe. Johnny and the bull become friends as they are casted in a movie.

episodes.name: Cookie Crisis
episodes.overview: Little Suzy tries to sell Johnny Girl Scout Cookies, but Johnny refuses.

episodes.name: I Used To Be Funny
episodes.overview: Two clowns are having a contest to see who can make the other laugh first and they use Johnny as their victim and play pranks on him, which made him late for a date.

episodes.name: My Fair Dork
episodes.overview: A dorky kid is trying to get a date with Suzy for a dance and Johnny shows him the way to get girls and the kid ends up getting girls by acting like Johnny and also gets a date with Suzy.

episodes.name: Twas The Night
episodes.overview: It is the night before Christmas and Johnny thinks Santa Claus is a burglar and injures him.

episodes.name: Blarney Buddies
episodes.overview: Johnny is in Ireland and reads about Barney Stone, a leprechaun who can grant wishes and he tries to track Barney down and he finally gives Johnny a wish.

episodes.name: Over The Hump!
episodes.overview: Johnny tries to join the Foreign Legion, but ends up at a game show where he has walk through the desert with a camel to go to fort in the desert.

episodes.name: Johnny Meets Farrah Fawcett
episodes.overview: Suzy invites Johnny to her birthday party, but he says he too busy to come. Then when he found out Suzy's cousin Farrah Fawcett was going to be there he tries to get into Suzie's party

episodes.name: Blanky Hanky Panky
episodes.overview: All the wool and material, including Johnny's blanky, are being stolen by a vicious wool-loving crook named Dr Filaniest and his kitten named Pooky! Johhny tracks down and thwarts the baddies! Hero.

episodes.name: Talk To Me, Baby
episodes.overview: Our favourite oaf gets on a talk show hosted a covergirl supermodel named Vendela and experiences first hand how life is like in Televisionland!

episodes.name: Hip Hop Flop
episodes.overview: Johnny hears of a hip-hop croup named The Round Pound and seeks advice from them after getting them a turntable to gain love to a female hip-hop fan!

episodes.name: Beach Blanket Bravo
episodes.overview: Johnny scores a hot chick but her boyfriend is jealous and decides to take on Johnny in a surfing contest which would be judged by a shark!

episodes.name: The Day The Earth Didn't Move Around Very Much
episodes.overview: Bravo explains to the court about how time froze yesterday and how he took advantage of it by eating candy without paying for it, having a free supper and spending a night at a hotel without paying for a key!

episodes.name: The Aisle Of Mixed-Up Toys
episodes.overview: The Aisle Of Mixed Up Toys   In order to get a little girl's adult sister to love him, Johnny must get some toys to sell for the homeless and when he gets to the toy store, he has to take part in a big war!

episodes.name: Substitute Teacher
episodes.overview: A robber robs Mr.Goodman, the karate teacher and Johnny helps him and the robber is pretending to be giving him a test for the next belt level.

episodes.name: A Wolf In Chick's Clothing
episodes.overview: Johnny goes out with a girl named Fluffy who changes into a wolf on full moons and Johnny and Fluffy spend the whole night out to wait for the sunrise.

episodes.name: Intensive Care
episodes.overview: Suzy is in the hospital and Mrs. Bravo and Johnny come to cheer her up and Johnny sees this nurse and every time he tries to get to her assistant Hons shows up and hurts Johnny and in the end Suzy and Johnny both caught the chicken measles.

episodes.name: Jumbo Johnny
episodes.overview: To become more muscular and bigger, Johnny purchases a new product called ""Uber Mass"". In the instructions said that it will take approximately 6 weeks to work, but Johnny did not care and drinks most of the entire surplus. As a result, Johnny becomes a FAT man.

episodes.name: The Perfect Gift
episodes.overview: Suzy creates a lemonade stand to earn money to buy a present for her mother for Mother's Day. When she sells her creative lemonade recipe to a big company for millions of dollars, she is able to spend the money for her mother. Johnny needed to find a way to get a pair of bunny slippers for his mother, by applying for jobs such as a battery tester.

episodes.name: Bravo, James Bravo
episodes.overview: Stuck together, Johnny and Jane had to capture Dr. Pencilneck and bring him to justice to get themselves removed from each other.

episodes.name: Going Batty
episodes.overview: Lois decides to make Johnny join the undead so she can make her undead campanion, Woody, jealous.

episodes.name: Berry The Butler
episodes.overview: As a prize for winning a contest, popular singer, Berry Vanderbolton would visit Bunny Bravo, and become her butler. Johnny uses this to his advantage by having Berry doing everything he wanted.

episodes.name: Red Faced In The White House
episodes.overview: Johnny gets a date with the President's daughter, and they go sightseeing in Washington with the Secret Service following them. Having her first human boyfriend, she realizes that human boys were a lot stranger.

episodes.name: The Man Who Cried Clown
episodes.overview: Johnny keeps seeing this clown, who is there to balance the wing and Johnny tries to get rid of the clown.

episodes.name: Johnny Real Good
episodes.overview: Johnny is trying to earn to earn money for a car so he babysits this kid named Timmy, who has powers and does bad stuff to Johnny.

episodes.name: Little Talky Tabitha
episodes.overview: Suzy got this new doll called Little Talky Tabitha and it talked to Johnny without its string being pulled and she threatened and did bad stuff to Johnny.

episodes.name: Johnny Bravo Meets Adam West!
episodes.overview: Mrs Bravo is supposed to be home at 6:00 after shopping but at 6:01, she is not home! Johnny sets out to find her! He gains the help of the original Batman, Adam West! They follow a ridiculous trail of clues that lead them of course to jail!

episodes.name: Under The Big Flop
episodes.overview: Johnny and Suzy all of a sudden find Jungle Boy at the circus under the control of an evil beautiful ringmaster and must save him before it's too late!

episodes.name: Johnny Meets Donny Osmond
episodes.overview: After breaking his mom's favourite cabinet thanks to Suzy's shenanigans, Johnny needs a nanny and Donny Osmond is the man for the job! He looks after Johnny in a Mary Poppins-like attitude but actually cramps Bravo's style in the process! Don't miss the ending of this episode!

episodes.name: Bikini Space Planet!
episodes.overview: Bikini Space Planet   Johnny is picked up by two aliens that he calls ""shiny mamas"" and taken back to their planet. Before they can start dating Johnny they need to give him a few painful tests. After the tests, they claim he is a perfect male specimen and crown him their king. After requesting the cable be fixed they see Braveheart and Mel Gibson and forget all about Johnny.

episodes.name: Moby Jerk
episodes.overview: Johnny is Fatty Nuggets' 1,000,000th customer and wins a cruise. Johnny is not at all interested until he hears that women will be on the cruise. Unfortunately Johnny gets on the wrong boat. Captain Spleen is not impressed with Johnny's attempt to party with the rowing slaves. Watch the captain's shoulder for a changing assortment of animals including a flamingo and bucket of chicken.

episodes.name: A Gel for Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny runs out of Mr. Kevin's Triple Strength Hair Cement and finds out that they factory shut down and so there is none anywhere. He buys a bunch of other gels trying to find another one that will

episodes.name: Johnny Get Your Tutu
episodes.overview: Johnny receives a letter that had a bubble sheet to fill out to identity what career Johnny will be in. But when Johnny accidentally sends a picture of Suzy, the result was that Johnny should be a ballerina.

episodes.name: Johnny's Inferno
episodes.overview: A demon is summon accidentally and receives help from Johnny to create evil in the world, by stepping on grass when there is a ""Keep Off The Grass"" signs and bringing an extra item through the express line at the grocery store.

episodes.name: Forest Chump
episodes.overview: Johnny and Carl get lost in the woods and Johnny falls in love with a native woman from there. Johnny would lie to stay but Carl rescues him.

episodes.name: Karma Krisis
episodes.overview: Johnny doesn't listen to his Mama's advice and he rips up a chain letter. This results in a long run of bad luck and a timely appearance by Dionne Warwick.

episodes.name: A Star Is Bruised
episodes.overview: Johnny meets his hero Squint Ringo (a Steven Seagal-look- alike) and performs the stuntman for his show.

episodes.name: The Prince and the Pinhead
episodes.overview: A prince from a far kingdom is boring of being ruler and sees that Johnny looks exactly like him, so they switch places.

episodes.name: Claws
episodes.overview: Johnny wants to make a special dinner for his mother and buys a lobster but it won't cooperate.

episodes.name: Cover Boy
episodes.overview: Johnny with a little help from Pops and Carl gets a job a fashion model so he can meet all the female fashion models but unfortunately gets exposed to poison ivy and is fired in the process.

episodes.name: To Helga And Back
episodes.overview: To Helga And Back   Our hero has sent away for a perfect woman but accidentally picks a Swedish woman named Helga, Johnny doesn't want her around so he takes her to a wrestling event to try and ruin their relationship, will it work?

episodes.name: Endless Bummer
episodes.overview: Johnny sets up shop as a lifeguard to attract women.

episodes.name: Jailbird Johnny
episodes.overview: A beureaucratic mix up gets Johnny thrown into a womens prison.

episodes.name: Bravo 13
episodes.overview: Johnny is mistakenly launched into space with a chimp

episodes.name: Doomates
episodes.overview: When Bunny puts in a V-chip to limit Johnny's TV-watching, he moves into a trailer, with Carl as his new roommate. Johnny and Carl soon begin to argue about the TV, and Carl wins the battle, only for the trailer to fall down a cliff, sending Johnny and Carl tumbling down.

episodes.name: Johnny's Telethon
episodes.overview: Fearing that his favourite beef jerky will go down with the dollar 3 store, Mr Bravo runs a telethon to raise up to 10,000 dollars to keep it in buisness!

episodes.name: Johnny's Guardian Angel
episodes.overview: After smashing Carl's newest computer, wrecking Mama's flowers and letting Suzy's balloon float away, Johnny wishes he was never born! Then Maurice the guardian angel shows Johnny what life would be like if he was never born in this superb parody of It's A Wonderful Life!

episodes.name: I, Fly
episodes.overview: Johnny accidentally turns himself into a fly while he was guarding Carl's science project. Now he is in the world where he lives with a human head and a fly's body while the fly has to live with the body of Johnny and has a head of a fly.

episodes.name: Shnook of the North
episodes.overview: When Johnny loses his mother in a store, he is given away to a foster family in the arctic.

episodes.name: Charm School Johnny
episodes.overview: Pops believes he can take uncivilized Johnny Bravo and turn him into a gentleman to pass him off in high society within 7 days.

episodes.name: Johnny and the Beanstalk
episodes.overview: Johnny had to sell the family cow to pay for the dry cleaning bill. He trades the cow for two bottles of hair tonic instead, and when he spilled the tonic, a giant hair stalk grows and at the top lives a giant who is certain that Johnny is an action figure.

episodes.name: A Boy and His Bird
episodes.overview: In an attempt to get a date with a beautiful dog-loving chick, Johnny adopts a pet emu, which proves to be more than he bargained for.

episodes.name: Ape is Enough
episodes.overview:
In an attempt to get a lunch date with a dog loving girl,Johnny adopts a pet emu which terrorizes everyone

Johnny visits the South Seas, where a GIANT gorrila falls in love with him.

episodes.name: Panic In Jerky Town
episodes.overview: Johnny wins a free trip for two to Jerky Town and takes Pops. Johnny was going to be named successor of Jerky Town and Pops found out the secret ingredient in the jerky.

episodes.name: Alien Confidential
episodes.overview: An alien lands on Earth with the secret of universal peace and then after Johnny takes to him to Pops a mob started chasing them and in the end he ended up on T.V.

episodes.name: Mama's New Boyfriend
episodes.overview: Bunny gets herself a new boyfriend named Raul Montoya but Johnny thinks that he's only loving her just to get at her cookie jar money! But in the end, our man Bravo finds out that Raul paid Bunny back!

episodes.name: Welcome Back, Bravo
episodes.overview: A clerical error results in Johnny having to pass the 4th grade all over again.

episodes.name: The Man with the Golden Gut
episodes.overview: Johnny orders an Ab machine, but his musceles form the shape of Mount Rushmore making him a tourist attraction.

episodes.name: Aunt Katie's Farm
episodes.overview: Johnny takes Little Suzy to her favorite Kiddies show and ends up as one of the cast.

episodes.name: A League of His Own
episodes.overview: Johnny poses as a girl who is "large for her age" in order to help out little Suzy's softball team.

episodes.name: Johnny Goes to Camp
episodes.overview: Johnny gets on the wrong bus and ends up at computer camp with Carl as his councelor.

episodes.name: Buffoon Lagoon
episodes.overview: Johnny is shipwrecked with a pretty girl who spends her time running from him.

episodes.name: Brave New Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny falls into a pool of hair gel and travels 500 years to the future.

episodes.name: Witless
episodes.overview: Johnny joins an Amish community and everybody thinks he's a relative from very far.

episodes.name: Carl Be Not Proud
episodes.overview: Johnny decides to be nice with Carl, thinking he's going to die and Carl takes advantage of that.

episodes.name: El Bravo Magnifico
episodes.overview: Johnny is mistook for a karate expert and agrees to help a ""South of the border"" town defeat an evil bandit.

episodes.name: Johnny O & Juliet
episodes.overview: Johnny tries to end the feud between his Mama and the new next door Mama so he can have a date with the tuba playing daughter.

episodes.name: Clan of the Cave Boob
episodes.overview: On an archeological dig, Carl tells Johnny of what he was like as a caveman who struggled to find a home.

episodes.name: Galaxy Boy
episodes.overview: Johnny bumps into a straship captain in the park and is beamed aboard his ship. There, Johnny wages war against the alien captain, Kharlok.

episodes.name: Damien's Day Out
episodes.overview: Johnny takes care of a little baby who is left on his porch and finally realizes that the baby can unleash evil powers.

episodes.name: Noir Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny becomes a detective (because the ladies love detectives) and takes the case of Suzy's missing dolly.

episodes.name: Hail To The Chump
episodes.overview: When the entire town council comes down with food poisoning at the annual picnic, Johnny is giving the duty of mayor. This is one of the funniest episodes so do'nt miss it.

episodes.name: A Fool For Sister Sara
episodes.overview: Sister Sara helps Johnny after a cologne induced hallucination, and that she would have a date with Johnny if he is nice.

episodes.name: Days Of Blunder
episodes.overview: When Johnny takes Mama's hot rod Carl convinces Johnny to enter an auto race, where Carl controlls it by a joystick but when the joystick short circuts Johnny is left to drive on his own!

episodes.name: Pop Art Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny takes Suzy to an art museum and Johnny becomes an artist after he made a butt print on the wall.

episodes.name: Dude Ranch Doofus
episodes.overview: Johnny and Mrs. Bravo spend a day at a dude ranch and Johnny tries to train D'Ablo, a horse, to win a girl's heart

episodes.name: A Cake Too Far
episodes.overview: Mrs. Bravo and Suzy enter a baking contest, but after Mrs. Bravo injures herself playing football, Johnny has to take her place and loses the recipe.

episodes.name: Look Who's Drooling
episodes.overview: When Johnny takes a bite out of Pops' hot chilli, he uses Carl's fountain of youth potion to cool down the flames. This made him revert back to a baby until 4:00pm, but her mother didn't care as she liked the idea of her baby boy being little again.

episodes.name: Law and Disorder
episodes.overview: Johnny becomes a security guard at the mall for a power trip. Instead of stopping crooks, he's picking up chicks and playing video games. Mama comes to the rescue when Johnny is held hostage by the crook.

episodes.name: Tooth or Consequences
episodes.overview: Johnny posses as the tooth fairy after feeling guilty for telling little Suzy she wasn't real. To prove his identity Suzy makes him grant her three wishes.

episodes.name: The Unsinkable Johnny Bravo
episodes.overview: Johnny is a poor third class peasant who falls in love with a rich first glass girl, whose name is Shelia. Just like Titanic, the boat sinks but the interesting part is that Shelia breaks up with Johnny.

episodes.name: Rashomoron
episodes.overview: Three different variations on a story taken place in the part where everyone was hurt, was told by Carl, Suzy, and Johnny.

episodes.name: Free Pookey
episodes.overview: The annual Weasel Roundup is interrupted by a beautiful animal rights activist. She says she's think differently of Johnny if he'd help animals. With the best of intentions, Johnny saves a piÃ±ata he names Pookey to return it to its native Mexico.

episodes.name: Good Knight Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny follows a girl dressed as a damsel to a renaissance carnival. He believes he has gone through a time portal and is really back in the middle ages. He tries to impress the locals with his 20th century knowledge only to ruin all the events at the carnival.

episodes.name: Balloon Platoon
episodes.overview: After getting hit by a kid who has a crush on little Suzy, Johnny recruits the best he can to overcome their evil forces.

episodes.name: The Clueless Kid
episodes.overview: Johnny's Karate teacher, Master Hama, claims the worst of his students could beat the best of his rival's. His rival takes him up on the challenge. So Johnny in order to protect the honor of the dojo must ude all he has learned to defeat the rivals student.

episodes.name: Yukon Yutz
episodes.overview: Johnny and Mrs.Bravo go to Canada and Johnny tries to get a mountie girl and ends up catching Slimy Pierre, a criminal.

episodes.name: Prep-School Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny goes to a prep school and three students: Nigel, Eurhart, and Piggy try to get him in trouble.

episodes.name: Send in the Clones
episodes.overview: Mama has Johnny deliver the electric bill but Johnny accidentally goes to a mad scientists laboratory where he is cloned. Then Johnny must prove to everyone else he is the real Johnny.

episodes.name: Loch Ness Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny and Mrs. Bravo go to Scotland and Johnny bought something back.

episodes.name: Den Mother Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny gives Mrs. Bravo smushweed,which she is allergic to and Johnny has to take over Mrs. Bravo's duties as den mother to Suzy's troop.

episodes.name: Quo Doofus
episodes.overview: Johnny trips into Carl's time machine and is teleported to ancient Rome where he is forced to fight in the collusium.

episodes.name: As I Lay Hiccupping
episodes.overview: Johnny eats to quickly and gets a severe case of the hiccups. He then visits a beautiful doctor who tells him that if his hiccups persist he can come back for her hands on treatment. So to get that Johnny tries to avoid the remedies of everyone in town.

episodes.name: Marine Maroon
episodes.overview: Johnny is taken to Sea Land when he is caught in a fishing net after he was sucked into the sea by a ripe tied, and he believed that he has found the lost city of Atlantis.

episodes.name: Thunder God Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny pulls a hammer from a block of ice in the style of sword in the stone and becomes a viking god with all sorts of power. He is told by the gods that he must fight an ice giant.

episodes.name: Luke Perry's Guide To Love
episodes.overview: Johnny receives help from Luke Perry to obtain a date.

episodes.name: In The Line of Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny becomes a security guard for a parade.

episodes.name: Fugitive Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny is chased by the police when they think he has stolen cookies from the police bake sale.

episodes.name: Virtual Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny takes Suzy to the toy store and suddenly becomes interested in the Biff Proton VR Game and decides to play it! But as he progress through the game, his actions are having an effect on reality!

episodes.name: Hold That Schmoe
episodes.overview: Knowing that it will sell millions, Johnny tries to get the first issue of ""Man Bean, The Bean That Walks Like A Man"" but it is guarded by a ghost! He and Carl try to take it on The Real Ghostbusters-style!

episodes.name: Hunted
episodes.overview: Mama gambles Johnny away to Colonel Fatman and Johnny is forced to be hunted but when it comes to hunting down Johnny Bravo, he is no pro in hiding!

episodes.name: Candidate Johnny
episodes.overview:
Johnny and Carl both try to run for Litter Commissioner in order to pick up girls!

Air Bravo

episodes.name: Johnny B. Badd
episodes.overview: Suzy's Funky Monkey song is a hit with the neighbours and Pops decides to make her, Carl and Mama stars! But Johnny wants to be the lead singer so Pops cuts the microphone cord to make things safe!

episodes.name: Air Bravo
episodes.overview: When Johnny meets Enormous Ferguson the famous basketball player and wants to help him and his the Pogatuck Ferrets take on the Townsville Titans!

episodes.name: Scoop Bravo
episodes.overview: In order to impress a beautiful newspaper editor. Johnny tries to follow a story that proves that cats are actually aliens from outer space.

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny continues to shrink and shrink until he is extremely tiny.

episodes.name: BackDaft
episodes.overview: Johnny signs up to be a fireman (to impress chicks) but can't do anything right.

episodes.name: The Johnny Bravo Affair
episodes.overview: Johnny falls asleep in a mummy casket and is awoken when a cat burgler tries to steal the largest piece of cubic serconium. But after he accidentally eats it he is kidnapped and taken back to her place (to his excitement) where Mama saves him

episodes.name: Biosphere Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny locks himself in the biosphere with a pretty lady scientist, Carl and others where he destroys all their resources making it so unless they eat someone they all will starve.

episodes.name: Spa Spaz
episodes.overview: Johnny checks into a spa to get pampered and meet girls. The manager sees how many toxins are in his system and decides that she will take him as her project that will ""put her spa on the map.""

episodes.name: Fool For A Day
episodes.overview: After being the butt of everyone's April Fool's jokes(including Little Suzy's class) Johnny thinks for a day about a way to get back at there teacher but when he does it isn't April Fool's anymore and the teacher beats him up.

episodes.name: In Your Dreams
episodes.overview: Johnny finally meets the girl of his dreams...in his dreams, at Carl's sleep clinic and as his dreams become nightmares he endures them to meet up again with his dream girl.

episodes.name: Some Like It Stupid
episodes.overview: On the run from Fish Lips Malone, Johnny and Carl disguise themselves as women for the Miss Perky beauty pagent.

episodes.name: Dental Hijinks
episodes.overview: Johnny has to go to the dentist because of a toothache and johnny is trying to escape the dentist.

episodes.name: Little Red Riding Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny is trying to get Squid Ringo's tungsten knuckles and they do not have anymore of Krelmann's Prune Spread and he thinks Suzy is taking some to her grandmother who lives in the woods.

episodes.name: Pouch Potato
episodes.overview: After being kicked off an outback tour he is adopted by a Mama 'Roo but he is an outcast untill he defends the herd from the infamous Boomerang Caine.

episodes.name: Jurassic Dork
episodes.overview: Johnny gets his hands on a real prehistoric dinosaur egg, which hatches! Now Johnny must keep his new pet, named Mr. Wuggles, from reaking havoc in Aron City!

episodes.name: Mascot Academy
episodes.overview: Johnny wants to be admired by football cheerleaders, but he has no chance of being a player.  Instead, he joins the Mascot Academy as a ""stinky fish head"" to get the cheerleaders to go out with him.

episodes.name: Full Metal Johnny
episodes.overview: While applying for Dodgeball Camp, Johnny accidentally signs up the army and has to deal with the roughest drill instructor ever, Sergent Trixie (who happens to be really cute).

episodes.name: Johnny On Ice
episodes.overview: While on a trip to the mountains, Johnny is frozen and thawed out by a scientist who thinks he's a primitive caveman!

episodes.name: Robo-Mama
episodes.overview: Bunny goes on a vacation to Las Vegas, and puts a robot mother in her place to take care of Johnny.

episodes.name: 20,000 Leagues Over My Head
episodes.overview: While searching for Clam-League 9000 toys, Johnny works with an environmentalist named Debbie to save fish.

episodes.name: I Dream Of Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny goes to an Arab Convention with Carl and he finds a genie that will grant him three wishes.

episodes.name: One Angry Bravo
episodes.overview: Johnny goes to a Court House.

episodes.name: Carnival Of The Darned
episodes.overview: Johnny runs away from home after blowing up the microwave oven and joins a freak show.

episodes.name: A Walk On The Stupid Side
episodes.overview: Suzy convinces Johnny to walk for charity but after walking around the world accidentally. They must stop him or else with there donations they'll need to pay billions of dollars.

episodes.name: Lone Star Bravo
episodes.overview: While looking at the family scrapbook, Mama tells Johnny the tail of Lonestar Bravo and how he became the sherrif of Moist Rock to impress frontier chicks.

episodes.name: Enter The Chipmunk
episodes.overview: When a chipmunk falls in Johnny's shirt during a karate match and ends up leveling everyone. His Master's rival is so impressed he kidnapps Johnny until he will teach his move.

episodes.name: The Great Bunny Book Ban
episodes.overview: The Harold And The Fuzzy Bunny Book has been taken off all library shelves by a greedy censorer named Mr Blowhart and Suzy must make him change his mind!

episodes.name: Toy Boy Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny is named CEO of a major toy conglomerate and invents action fiures of himself for the holiday season. But when they are defective he is fired.

episodes.name: FrankenBravo
episodes.overview: Mr Bravo meets a mad scientist and he has made the perfect female monster and she and Johnny are on the run from an angry mob!

episodes.name: Lodge Brother Johnny
episodes.overview: When Johnny agrees to take the initation trial for the "Brotherhood of the Gnu", a group that Pops and Carl are members of, he must face the daunting tasks of eating one potato chip and listening to Brother Ernie's unnecessarly long story of buying a new couch.

episodes.name: Chain Gang Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny is a member of the Chain gang.

episodes.name: Lumberjack Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny becomes a lumberjack.

episodes.name: Lord of the Links
episodes.overview: Johnny becomes a golfer to earn money for himself.

episodes.name: Bootman
episodes.overview: When the Green Swoosh (a Green Lantern-like superhero) gets injured by a falling meteor, Johnny gets the source of his power, the super boots!  Now armed with super strength and speed, Johnny tries his hand at being a superhero... and fails miserable.

episodes.name: Freudian Dip
episodes.overview: Johnny keeps having horrible nightmares about a monster, and it's driving Mama crazy.  Suzy, armed with a degree in psychology she earned over the internet, decides to psychoanalyze Johnny and find the root of his terrifying dreams.

episodes.name: Auteur! Auteur!
episodes.overview: Johnny is a film director, writer and a star of a new movie that he has created using a $7 million arts grant from the government of the United States of America.

episodes.name: Runaway Train
episodes.overview: Johnny mistakenly boards the Blue Goose 9000, a supersonic train prototype instead of a commuter train heading to visit his aunt.

episodes.name: A Reject Runs Through It
episodes.overview: Carl and Pops dare Johnny to catch a rare fish, the "potty-mouth salmon".

episodes.name: The Island Of Mrs. Morceau
episodes.overview: After traveling to this island to meet babes, Johnny is turned into half-man, Half-hamster. Enraged by this Johnny vows to destroy the mutating machine.

episodes.name: The Color Of Mustard
episodes.overview: Johnny has retired from proffesional badminton because of a courtside accident, but after being challanged by a pretty girl and a prize of a date with her he quickly agrees to a match.

episodes.name: The Hansel & Gretel Project
episodes.overview:
The Hansel And Gretel  Little Suzy and Carl convince Johnny to help them make a movie about the Hansel and Gretel witch who lives at the edge of town.

I.Q. Johnny  Johnny buys a drink supposed to make chimps smart, this makes Johnny smart just in time to save the town during a nuclear meltdown.

Get Stinky  Johnny's childhood nemisis, Stinky, moves back to town and she is now very pretty and actually interested in him but he is unable to see that just the memories of all the practicle jokes she played on him.

episodes.name: I.Q. Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny buys a drink supposed to make chimps smart, this makes Johnny smart just in time to save the town during a nuclear meltdown.

episodes.name: Get Stinky!
episodes.overview: Johnny's childhood nemisis, Stinky, moves back to town and she is now very pretty and actually interested in him but he is unable to see that just the memories of all the practicle jokes she played on him.

episodes.name: A Johnny Bravo Christmas
episodes.overview: Johnny forgets to send a letter to Santa Claus and he must reach to the North Pole before Christmas. But when the post office tells him there is no way to get the letters to the north pole Johnny now must journey to the north pole himself! Unsure of where Santa lives he agrees to take little Suzy along with him. They at first become stowaways on a plane but after getting dropped out along with circus animals Suzy contacts a trucker by radio, who is able to give them a ride to the airport! There they get a lift going towards the North Pole along the way picking up the infamous Donny Osmand (when there flying he runs into there window while floating around on his umbrella! With Donny Osmands help they find Santa but will Johnny get a gift? watch to find out!

episodes.name: It's Valentine's Day, Johnny Bravo
episodes.overview: It's Valentines Day...that means Johnny Bravo's birthday! In celebration, Johnny invites everyone as he goes out in search of the perfect date.

episodes.name: Johnny Bravo Goes to Hollywood
episodes.overview: Johnny Bravo is offered a role in the upcoming movie ""Lunch Lady Surprise"" and will get to star with Don Knotts, Jessica Biel, a Hobbit, and Alec Baldwin. When Johnny Bravo's part gets written out of the script however, Johnny Bravo tries desperately to squeeze a few more seconds out of his fifteen minutes of fame.

episodes.name: Traffic Troubles
episodes.overview: A jaywalking incident lands Johnny in traffic school... Musical Comedy Traffic School, no less! Unfortunately, Johnny can't sing a note, so he seeks the help of a kindly old lady in figuring out how to make the grade and impress the Token Spunky Girl.

episodes.name: My Funny Looking Friend
episodes.overview: Inspired by the antics of a fellow macho-man at the mall, Johnny enlists the aid of a funny-looking friend to impress the ladies. After looking high and low for the perfect funny-looking friend, Johnny finds a pro who knows how to reel in the chicks... but how long will Johnny's newfound success with women last?

episodes.name: Win An El Toro Guapo
episodes.overview: Johnny tries to enter a contest to win an ""El Toro Guapo"" pick-up truck. It seems all he has to do is outlast a host of competitors in holding on to a rather talkative bull, but could it really be that simple?

episodes.name: Witch-ay Woman
episodes.overview: Johnny gets on the bad side of a gypsy lady with his clumsy passes, so naturally she puts a curse on him. And what could be a more fitting curse for the womanizing Johnny than turning him into a woman? Looks like Johnny Bravo's taking a walk on the feminine side as ""Jenny Bravo"" until he (she?) learns his (her?) lesson.

episodes.name: Home Alone
episodes.overview: Mama Bravo goes out of town on vacation, and Johnny convinces her to let him stay home alone for the week. Things don't go as well as Johnny would have hoped, though, as one disaster after another strikes his home, culminating in a band of fairy tale creatures storming into his house and throwing a wild party! Can Johnny humble himself enough to ask Little Suzy from next door for help fixing the house before Mrs. Bravo gets home?

episodes.name: Mini JB
episodes.overview: Johnny finds himself stuck looking after a baby boy, and decides to teach the kid to be more like him in order to make the situation bearable. Much to his surprise, the ladies are quite smitten with what they believe to be a father-son duo, and Johnny plans on using the kid as a babe magnet. But what happens when ""Mini JB"" has to go home to mother?

episodes.name: Back From The Future
episodes.overview: After Johnny bugs a woman to the point that she threatens to knock him into next week (and follows through on her threats), a band of sci-fi geeks find a dazed Johnny and become convinced he's a time traveler from the 1960s. Complicating matters is the fact that the easily-confused Johnny becomes convinced of this misconception as well.

episodes.name: Non, Oui, Oui Pour Johnny
episodes.overview: Johnny takes up French class with Mama so the two of them can take the trip to Paris, France Mama's always wanted to take. But Johnny's a slow learner, and the instructor's snooty attitude isn't helping. Can Johnny make the grade and make his Mama's dream come true?

episodes.name: That's Entertainment
episodes.overview: Movie night at the Bravo house is called off when the TV goes on the fritz. Fortunately, who should show up but Johnny's old ""friend"" Donny Osmond, who suggests that he, Mama Bravo, Johnny, and Little Suzy take turns telling stories to keep themselves entertained. As can be expected in a cartoon, that leads to a real gaggle of twisted tales.

episodes.name: Get Shovelized!
episodes.overview: Johnny buys a shovel that has been announced on TV as a new workout device named 'The Shovelizer'. Can the city survive Johnny shovelizing around?

episodes.name: T Is For Trouble
episodes.overview: Johnny gets a response to a letter he sent to Mr. T when he was a kid. Little Ricky Simmons the school bully was always picking on him. Mr. T trains johnny to stand up to Little Ricky Simmons. he goes to ricky simmons' house (who grew up to be the famous nutritanist Richard Simmons),who picks on him again, pretending to be johnny's friends.

episodes.name: Gray Matters
episodes.overview: Johnny freaks out when he awakes with a gray hair

episodes.name: Double Vision
episodes.overview: Johnny goes home with look-a-like of his mother.

episodes.name: It's A Magical Life
episodes.overview: Johnny beleives a magician makes him invisiable

episodes.name: The Hunk At The End Of This Cartoon
episodes.overview: Johnny fears the new hunk in town

episodes.name: The Time Of My Life
episodes.overview: Johnny tells Suzi a story about his first crush.

episodes.name: Run Johnny Run
episodes.overview: Johnny has to make it to his blind date in time but when he doesn't the first time he grabs the remote and restarts the cartoon.

episodes.name: Wilderness Protection Program
episodes.overview: Wilderness Protection Program: An elk pretends that she and Johnny are married elephants because she's on the run from some people she thinks are a mob out to take over the world.   A Page Right Out of History: In the distant past, an same-named ancestor of Johnny living in Bedrock is rescued by Fred Flintstone, and soon finds himself doing Fred's chores as a way of repaying Fred.

episodes.name: A Page Right Out Of History
episodes.overview: In the distant past, an same-named ancestor of Johnny living in Bedrock is rescued by Fred Flintstone, and soon finds himself doing Fred's chores as a way of repaying Fred.

episodes.name: Some Walk By Night
episodes.overview: Johnny ends up on a reality TV show as a detective.

episodes.name: Adam West's Date-O-Rama
episodes.overview: Johnny is on a dating show and gets a blind date with the Black Widow.

episodes.name: Johnny Makeover
episodes.overview: Johnny Bravo becomes the target of Don Knotts, "Weird Al" Yankovic, and the Blue Falcon for their reality show, Cartoon Makeover. The trio attempts to completely revamp him to make him a huge hit for the new youth generation. Unfortunately, their tactics only make things worse for poor Johnny.

episodes.name: Back On Shaq
episodes.overview: At a basketball match, Shaquille O'Neal discovers that Johnny Bravo brings him good luck. This occurs up to Shaq's showdown match with Seth Green whose brought along his own good luck charm by the name of Huckleberry Hound.
